Thank you, {{flow.variables.value. firstName}}. I've noted your request down. Will ping you on spot confirmation once the lineup is ready by Monday! ü´°

N.B. Your preference might not be preferred while curation.

Sorry {{flow.variables.value.firstName}}. I only help in managing weekday spots at Glens Bakehouse, Koramangala. 

I curate the lineups on Monday, and you can ping me on Sundays to check for a spot on the following week.

Sorry {{flow.variables.value.firstName}}, but I can only help you request spots at Glen's if available. 
But for that, you gotta ask me nicely, like: "Can I get a spot for next week?"

Sorry {{flow.variables.value. firstName}}. Unfortunately, no spots are available for this week, as you already had a spot last week.

properties.body: Hmm... That does't sound like a day. Please select one from the dropdown.
Hmm... That doesn't sound like a viable timeslot. Please select one from the dropdown.
Houston... Dropping in a ping to check if the mics happened today.
Did 8 PM happen today?
Did 10 PM happen today?
Noted... ü´°

Hey, {{flow.variables.value. firstName}}.
I do not yet handle curation for 8 PM mics. As I only take care of 10 PM lineups, I will note you down if a 10 PM spot is available for {{widgets.spot_day.inbound.Body}}  this week.

Please drop a ping to Akash to ask for an 8 PM spot. ü´°

No worries. Free will is, anyway, a myth! xD

I anyways have your request down, will update your spot confirmation on Monday. ü´°
